Header: The Sea Turtle Decision Support Tool (DST)  integrates multiple data sources within a simple and standardized user interface.  The DST enables users to qualitatively analyze project specific sea turtle entrainment risk associated with Trailing Suction Hopper Dredges.
Instructions: Pan and Zoom to your area of interest using the interactive map on the left side of the screen.
Once the area of interest is defined, create a new analysis by clicking the button below.
After creating a new analysis the user will be guided through a 4 step process to “ANALYZE” relevant data, “DEFINE” absolute risk thresholds, “MITIGATE” risk, and generate a final “REPORT.”
Footer: The results of the analysis will be available for export as both a PDF and related data.
Step1Instructions: In order to select your area of interest, first select a time period over which to summarize the data. This will activate the ability to select one or more contiguous blocks to analyze. Variables available for analysis will be enabled once you submit your area of interest using the “Apply Selection” button. When you have made your selections and documented any assumptions, click the “Analyze Data” button at the bottom of the screen.
